properties.areaDesc: Waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 2:18AM EST until January 8 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds around 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
expected.

* WHERE...Southeast Georgia and Northeast Florida coastal waters
from Altamaha Sound GA to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY
